title: SKT Icon doesn't appear in Hextech Crafting after purchasing

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I recently purchased an SKT worlds icon from the shop but it doesn't appear in my hextech crafting. Tried it out with the C9 icon and it works fine from what the picture shows. What happened here?

EDIT: just checked my purchase history and my SKT icon isn't appearing anywhere even though my SKT icon is currently my summoner icon.

replies.body: It looks like you obtained the SKT icon, but the transaction never actually processed so no RP was removed or upgrades provided.  Are you able to return to the store and purchase the icon now?  Let me know!
